title: What are some algebra problems for grade sevens? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a few extremely important concepts (they show up everywhere in the SAT and ACT) that you can practice! Try getting comfortable with the following: Solving linear equationsSlope-intercept and point-slope formCalculating the slope of a lineFactoring polynomialsUsing the rational root theoremGet familiar with the quadratic formula (Google the song!)I’m sure there are many more exercises that you could do to improve your skills in mathematics! Good luck!
Math, stop bothering me and solve your own problems. We tired of helping find your X. (To avoid charges of plagiarism I found these jokes on T-shirts.)
